price: (91) Thus.[797] And We had encompassed [all] that he had in knowledge.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَقَدۡ أَحَطۡنَا بِمَا لَدَيۡهِ خُبۡرٗا
footnotes: [797]- Such was the affair of Dhul-Qarnayn.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika waqad aḥaṭnā bimā ladayhi khub'ran
